titles.title: Energy Production Freedom Act
To amend the Clean Air Act to provide that greenhouse gases are not subject to the Act, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 3/31/2011--Introduced. Energy Production Freedom Act - Amends the Clean Air Act to: (1) exclude from the definition of the term "air pollutant" carbon dioxide, methane, nitrous oxide, hydrofluorocarbons, perfluorocarbons, or sulfur hexafluoride; and (2) declare that nothing in the Act shall be treated as authorizing or requiring the regulation of climate change or global warming.
